effect.name: PixelPalette (Multi Palette)
effect.author: NaitorStudios
effect.description: Uses red value as index for a color from a palette. You can have any amount of palettes, each one can have up to 256 colors. On iOS, lerpA and lerpB must be shifted by 1, so when refering to the first palette use -1, second palette 0.

parameter.name: Palettes
parameter.description: A palette with 256px of width, use each row for a new palette.

parameter.name: Palette amount
parameter.description: The amount of rows. If you have more than one and don't specify, it might get the wrong palette colors.

parameter.name: Mix A
parameter.description: Start palette. If you don't need mixing, you can just set the palette with this and leave Mix Value as 0.

parameter.name: Mix Value
parameter.description: Mixes the colors between Palette A and B.
